summary: Completed comprehensive testing of enhanced trip management features for multi-tenant logistics SaaS. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend landing page loads correctly but authentication required for full UI testing.

integration_issues.issue: Demo session token approach doesn't automatically authenticate users to access protected routes
integration_issues.impact: Cannot fully test Trips page UI without proper authentication
integration_issues.workaround: Manual Google OAuth login required for full UI testing

passed_tests: Demo session authentication working via API
Create trip with route array (JSON array format: ['Johannesburg', 'Harare', 'Lagos'])
Trip number uniqueness validation - correctly rejects duplicate trip_number in same tenant
Update trip status to 'closed' - correctly sets locked_at timestamp
Add expense to trip with category 'fuel' - working with all required fields
List trip expenses - returns proper array of expenses
Get trip details includes expenses and expense_totals - complete data structure
Trip locking business rules - assign/unassign shipment properly controlled on locked trips
Delete trip cleanup - properly unassigns shipments and deletes expenses
Google Sign In button present and functional
Multi-tenant SaaS branding and messaging displayed
Demo dashboard data cards showing shipments statistics
Features list with logistics capabilities displayed
Protected route redirects working (trips page requires authentication)
Page layout and responsive design elements working
No JavaScript errors on landing page
